mapper.select: SELECT id, plan_id, batch_no, day_age, record_type, SUM( breeding_value ) AS breeding_value, unit, ENABLE FROM breeding_record WHERE ENABLE = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{todayDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY plan_id, record_type

SELECT plan_id , batch_no, coop_id, day_age, SUM( CASE WHEN record_type = 1 THEN breeding_value END ) AS fodder_amount, SUM( CASE WHEN record_type = 4 THEN breeding_value END ) AS dead_amount, COUNT(CASE WHEN record_type = 1 THEN breeding_value END) as fodder_times, create_time FROM breeding_record WHERE enable = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{todayDate} GROUP BY plan_id,coop_id

SELECT r.plan_id, r.batch_no, r.day_age, SUM( CASE WHEN r.record_type = 4 THEN r.breeding_value END ) AS dead_amount, SUM( CASE WHEN r.record_type = 1 THEN r.breeding_value END ) AS fodder_amount, p.technician_id AS technician_id, p.technician AS technician, r.create_time as create_time FROM breeding_record r INNER JOIN breeding_plan p ON r.plan_id = p.id WHERE r.ENABLE = 1 AND p.ENABLE = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT( r.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{todayDate}, '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY r.plan_id
